title: Two Interviews with Type Designers -- If You Missed 'Em
content:
Two interviews with type designers on the [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016220424/http:/garciamedia.com/blog) of Mario Garcia, publication design consultant, that may be of interest:

[Peter Bil'ak on the Indian Type Foundry and type on the iPad](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016220424/http:/garciamedia.com/blog/articles/romania_libera_new_logo_new_look_new_start) (scroll halfway down the page)

[Nadine Chahine on Arabic typography, with great tips for newspaper and magazine designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016220424/http:/garciamedia.com/blog/articles/my_ipad_review_its_an_a_nadine_chahine_interview_and_more) (scroll about a quarter down the page)
author: Reed Reibstein

comments.content:
Incidentally, the first article you linked talks about the redesign of România Liberă, a well-known paper in my native country. I'm currently abroad, so I cannot assess the redesign firsthand, but from the photographs on Mr. Garcia's site, it's not "stellar" work by any means (especially considering some of the other work produced by this agency.) Alas, Romania seems to be condemned to missed opportunities.

You all carry on now...
